description: [PULSECHECK](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1108) can check HTTP request headers for a specific backdoor key and if found will output the result of the command in the variable `HTTP_X_CMD.`(Citation: Mandiant Pulse Secure Zero-Day April 2021)

external_references.description: Perez, D. et al. (2021, April 20). Check Your Pulse: Suspected APT Actors Leverage Authentication Bypass Techniques and Pulse Secure Zero-Day. Retrieved February 5, 2024.
